price: Et ton peuple traite cela (le Coran) de mensonge, alors que c’est la vérité. Dis : "Je ne suis pas votre garant .
arabic: وَكَذَّبَ بِهِۦ قَوۡمُكَ وَهُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّۚ قُل لَّسۡتُ عَلَيۡكُم بِوَكِيلٖ
footnotes: [292] Votre garant: «Je ne suis chargé que de la communication des enseignements de l’Islam».

version.title: French Translation - Muhammad Hamidullah
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Muhammad Hamidullah. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wakadhaba bihi qawmuka wahuwa al-ḥaqu qul lastu ʿalaykum biwakīlin
